channel.title: Court Wizard Competition (updated)
channel.description:
Court Wizard Blue Dragon Support Day Abilities
Focus Magic (1-2 Charges) (must wait 3 days before use) Tonight when you use Magic door Hides you and another target from any visits for one night.
Night Abilities Magic Door (3 charges): Hides the target for one night.
Magic Shield (Infinite): Places a barrier on the target that makes them immune to conversions and occupation/target changing
Feedback: “A magic barrier protected you from occupation” “Your magic barrier protected you from conversion”
Keep Sage as is.
